description: Create a time card cost code allocation.
permissions: Admin users; otherwise users who are practical members of the allocation customer (policy create).
side_effects: Creates a time card cost code allocation; touches related time_card and job_production_plan; refreshes invoice revisions; updates project phase cost item actuals.
validation_notes: --time-card is required. --details is required and must be a JSON array of allocation objects. Each allocation object may only include cost_code_id, percentage, and project_cost_classification_id; percentage must be between 0 and 1; total percentage across allocations must equal 1.0 (100%); cost_code_id values must belong to the customer; duplicate cost_code_id values are not allowed.
